    Class
    Description
    Direction
    The Direction enum represents the four directions North South East and West that are used to define the sides of a room.
    Door
    Abstract product The Door class represents a door in the maze to connects two rooms.
    MapSite
    An abstract class that represents a component of the maze.
    Maze
    Represents the maze, containing all the rooms.
    MazeFactory
    Abstract factory: Factory class for creating new maze components: Maze, Room, Wall, and Door.
    Room
    Abstract product class Represents a room in the maze.
    Spell
    Represents a spell, which can be associated with enchanted rooms or doors requiring spells to open.
    Wall
    Represents a wall in the maze.
